content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- 3 Stone furnaces at positions (1,1), (3,1), (5,1)
- 3 Burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5), (3.5,2.5), (5.5,2.5)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5), (3.5,3.5), (5.5,3.5)

### Secondary Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- 2 Stone furnaces at positions (2,7), (4,7)
- 3 Burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5), (4.5,8.5), (3.5,9.5)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5), (4.5,9.5)
- Transport belt system connecting furnaces

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=11.5-17.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters at (14.5,12.5), (12.5,14.5), (16.5,14.5)
- Storage chests at (14.5,11.5), (11.5,14.5), (17.5,14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)
- Storage chests at (21.5,11.5), (21.5,12.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Connected to electricity network

### Electricity Distribution Network
Large electricity network (ID 14506) connecting various assembling machines, labs and power generation

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fuel and resources
- Ensure you have coal in inventory before attempting to insert it into machines
- Check if required resources are available before starting production (copper plate for copper cable, iron plate for electronic circuits)

### Errors with entity connections
- When connecting entities (like pipes), ensure connection points are not blocked by other entities
- Verify that entities are properly aligned and have clear paths for connections
- Consider repositioning entities if connection points are blocked

### Entity placement considerations
- Check if target tiles are clear before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow for connections and inserter operations
